summary: Is that 'Apostle' movie any good? What is it about? Could you write a short summary, please?! Thank you!
question: Is that 'Apostle' movie any good? What is it about? Could you write a short summary, please?! Thank you!
answer:
You can find a summary here: https://www.rogerebert.com/reviews/apostle-2018

I think it’s a good movie, well made and well played. But it’s a sort of horror, so it’s not always easy to watch. Anyway, another great performance by the chameleonic Michael Sheen.

reblog.comment:
You can find a summary here: https://www.rogerebert.com/reviews/apostle-2018

You can find a summary here: https://www.rogerebert.com/reviews/apostle-2018

I think it’s a good movie, well made and well played. But it’s a sort of horror, so it’s not always easy to watch. Anyway, another great performance by the chameleonic Michael Sheen.

blog.name: michaelsheen
blog.title: michaelsheen
blog.description:
Brittany. 22.
Stannis Baratheon loyalist. 
Masters of Sex, Mad Men, A Song of Ice and Fire, and a shitload of other tv shows, movies, video games, history and the occasional old man. 
Michael Sheen is the supreme bae. 
Christoph Waltz and John Slattery get an honorable mention. 
Bobby Kennedy deserved better.

tags: but does he...does he know that me uploading it to vimeo where people can watch for free is illegal loooooool
also if you were curious like me
the date on that sony email means that he was chewing them out at the AFI awards that were on January 10 2014
also i think he stayed hella pissed about MoS not continuing on in the UK
I remember a tweet where somebody asked him about it and he was like 'i guess there wasn't enough support for it'

summary: The weather is atrocious. I think we here in Dublin are getting our years quota of rain in one day. I’ve decided to keep warm my...
body:
It’s Raining, Its Pouring

The weather is atrocious. I think we here in Dublin are getting our years quota of rain in one day. I’ve decided to keep warm my watching one of my most favourite period dramas: Far from the Madding Crowd (2015)

Everything about it is stunning. The cinematography, the music, the performances.

It also helps that Michael Sheen is at his most handsomeness.

I mean, look at the handsome!!!

Look at it!

*swoons*

blog.name: iamthebricklayer
blog.title: THE VIRTUE OF BEING
blog.description:
I am Randi. 30. Christian. American. Living with Hydrocephalus with a VP shunt. INFP-T. College graduate. Graphic Designer. Artist. Writer. Reader. Photographer. Movie buff. Theater lover. Multi-fandom (obviously). 
Active on Tumblr since May of 2011, and I've been addicted ever since!
